trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento per personalizzare l'aspetto dei nodi in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controllo mediante il disegno personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and a node is displayed or updated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento viene generato da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controllare quando il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e un nodo viene visualizzato o aggiornato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The DrawTreeNodeEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node.
trans-unit.target: Il DrawTreeNodeEventArgs passato al gestore dell'evento contiene informazioni sul nodo da creare e fornisce metodi che consentono di disegnare il nodo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> properties to retrieve information about the node to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>per recuperare informazioni relative al nodo da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà per eseguire il disegno effettivo all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per rendere il sistema operativo di un nodo che non è necessario essere proprietario, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the area indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property includes the label portion of the node only.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, l'area indicata dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà include la parte dell'etichetta del nodo solo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>include l'intero nodo, compresa l'area in genere utilizzata per le icone, caselle di controllo, segni più e meno e le linee che collegano i nodi di area.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> area su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> all'interno del quale disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> valori che indicano lo stato corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni e posizione di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso specificato da questa proprietà è rispetto all'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, the area specified by the Bounds property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Quando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, l'area specificata dalla proprietà limiti è l'area in cui è possibile fare clic su un nodo per selezionarlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se si disegna all'esterno di questa area di hit test, è necessario fornire il proprio codice per la selezione di un nodo quando viene selezionato nell'area visibile.

trans-unit.source: You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile fornire la propria hit test il codice quando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the Bounds property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, rather than the just hit test region.
trans-unit.target: In questa modalità, la proprietà Bounds include l'intero nodo per l'intera larghezza del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controllare, anziché l'area appena hit test.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> deve essere disegnato dal sistema operativo anziché proprietario.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà su `true` per i nodi che non si desidera personalizzare quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, questo è utile quando si desidera personalizzare solo i nodi che sono in uno stato specifico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node should be drawn by the operating system; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the node will be drawn in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il nodo deve essere disegnato dal sistema operativo. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se il nodo verrà creato nel gestore eventi.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per disegnare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornisce proprietà e metodi utili per il disegno sul dispositivo di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>oggetto da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Questo è utile quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>proprietà non fornisce le informazioni appropriate per soddisfare le esigenze.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di stato di base che è possibile utilizzare, ad esempio, per determinare se un nodo viene selezionato, selezionato o con stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Node property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del nodo, d'altra parte, consente di accedere a tutti i membri del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state.
trans-unit.target: È necessario accedere al nodo direttamente, ad esempio, quando si desidera determinare lo stato di espansione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per controllare se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>disegnare l'oggetto è in un determinato stato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the node.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di base sullo stato del nodo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà, ad esempio, per determinare se un nodo viene selezionato, selezionato o con stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si desiderano maggiori informazioni, recuperare il nodo tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare se il nodo è espanso, ad esempio, è necessario recuperare il nodo e controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una combinazione bit per bit del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> che indica lo stato corrente di valori di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.
